title: HexTrackr Device Naming Pattern Configuration
description: Configuration for parsing device hostnames and extracting site/location information

locationPatterns.description: Patterns for extracting location from hostname
locationPatterns.comment: Location is everything BEFORE the device type pattern

siteCodeMappings.description: Map extracted locations to known 4-character site codes (Hexagon EAM)
siteCodeMappings.comment: Key = location string, Value = {site_code, confidence, aliases}

fallbackRules.comment: If regex parsing fails, fall back to substring extraction

fuzzyMatchSettings.comment: When user types site/location, fuzzy search existing codes
